name: Silurus-classifieds-script
tagline: Silurus is a PHP Classifieds script that was built for you
body:
* What is Silurus?

Silurus is a professionally developed PHP Classifieds script that was built for you. Whether you are running classifieds for autos, motorcycles, bicycles, rvâ€™s, guns, horses, or general merchandise, our product is the right package for you. It has template system and no limit to usage with free for any changes.


* Try PHP Classifieds script

Take Silurus for a test drive. Our demo is a fully working version of Silurus web site and you are free to play around with it. This demo is specified for books sales web site.

User interface
- Login: demo Password: demo
- Link: http://silurus.snowhall.com/

Admin area
- Login: admin Password: admin
- Link: http://silurus.snowhall.com/admin/##
